name: Dice it Boba!
description:
This dice drafting game was created in 2 days for the GamesPlusJam 2022. We hope you enjoy mixing some boba, Thank you!

Mix the right boba combination with your Icy Dicey and serve them to your customers! Watch out, if you mess up an order or take too much time, the ducks will get angry! Try to serve as much boba as you can and get a high score!

How to Play:

You’ll only need the mouse (cursor) to play the game!

  1. Study the order when the ducks come in.
  2. Roll the dice with the Reroll Button so they land in the right ingredient compartments.
  3. Drag the dice from the ingredient compartment into the cup to fill it up.
  4. Once all the ingredients are mixed in, press the Cap Button to finish the drink.
  5. Lastly, drag the cup to your customer!
  6. You’ll fail the drink if you give the customer the wrong mix or take too long on an order.
  7. The game will end once the music stops, so act fast!

Messed up? Don’t worry, you can use the Trash Button to start over!
